AION-EUR.summary: Aion (AION) is a cryptocurrency . Users are able to generate AION through the process of mining. Aion has a current supply of 492,427,074. The last known price of Aion is 0.34011307 USD and is down -1.19 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 22 active market(s) with $17,451,027.65 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://theoan.com/.
